description: Admiral Donan is the commander of the 23rd galactic frontier division, led from his command ship, the battleship Baroume. A large man with an equally large appetite, he can usually be seen eating with both hands at once while sitting in his command chair. Called a "disgusting man" by http://anidb.net/ch7044 [Dom], Donan`s battle tactics are as crude as his table manners.
name: Rakuram Do Donan
